formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: \( P_o = \frac{\sum_i n_{ii}}{N} \) \( P_e = \frac{\sum_i (n_{i+} \cdot n_{+i})}{N^2} \) \( \kappa = \frac{P_o - P_e}{1 - P_e} \) where \(n_{ii}\) are diagonal (agreements), \(n_{i+}\) are row totals, \(n_{+i}\) are column totals, \(N\) is total.

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
